alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:33PM EDT until August 04 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... East central Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 333 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woods Bay State Park, or 12 miles west of Lake City, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Woods Bay State Park, Turbeville, Shiloh and Gable. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 131 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways or walk through high water.
